statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement_id, requirement_name FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT requirement_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_name LIKE 'Data%';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT MAX(requirement_id) FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT AVG(requirement_id) FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement_id, description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT requirement_id, requirement_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements ORDER BY requirement_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements ORDER BY requirement_name ASC;
SELECT requirement_id, description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_id > 5 AND compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_requirements FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status IS NOT NULL;
SELECT requirement_id, LENGTH(description) AS description_length FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT DISTINCT requirement_name FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_name = 'Data Privacy';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7);
SELECT AVG(requirement_id) AS avg_requirement_id FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE description LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT requirement_id, requirement_name FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_compliance FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements ORDER BY requirement_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT requirement_name FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT requirement_id) AS total_requirements FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement_id, requirement_name, description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT requirement_id, requirement_name, description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = TRUE AND description LIKE '%compliant%';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = FALSE ORDER BY requirement_name DESC;
SELECT requirement_id, requirement_name, description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY requirement_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_requirements FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT requirement_name, COUNT(*) AS total_compliance FROM regulatory_requirements GROUP BY requirement_name;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = TRUE OR compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT requirement_id, UPPER(requirement_name) AS uppercase_name FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement_id, requirement_name, LENGTH(description) AS description_length FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement_id, requirement_name, SUBSTR(description, 1, 50) AS description_substr FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT AVG(requirement_id) AS avg_id, MAX(requirement_id) AS max_id, MIN(requirement_id) AS min_id FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement_id, requirement_name, compliance_status, CASE WHEN compliance_status = TRUE THEN 'Compliant' ELSE 'Non-Compliant' END AS compliance_status_text FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement_id, requirement_name, description, compliance_status, CASE WHEN compliance_status = TRUE THEN 'Yes' ELSE 'No' END AS is_compliant FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement_name, description FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records;
SELECT date, description FROM compliance_records;
SELECT r.requirement_name, c.date FROM regulatory_requirements r INNER JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id;
SELECT r.requirement_name, c.date FROM regulatory_requirements r LEFT JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id;
SELECT r.requirement_name, c.date FROM regulatory_requirements r RIGHT JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id;
SELECT r.requirement_name, c.date FROM regulatory_requirements r FULL JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id;
SELECT r.requirement_name AS requirement, c.description AS record_description FROM regulatory_requirements r INNER JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id;
SELECT r.requirement_name, COUNT(c.record_id) AS record_count FROM regulatory_requirements r INNER JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id GROUP BY r.requirement_name;
SELECT r.requirement_name, MAX(c.date) AS latest_record_date FROM regulatory_requirements r INNER JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id GROUP BY r.requirement_name;
SELECT r.requirement_name, MIN(c.date) AS earliest_record_date FROM regulatory_requirements r INNER JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id GROUP BY r.requirement_name;
SELECT r.requirement_name, AVG(c.record_id) AS avg_record_id FROM regulatory_requirements r INNER JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id GROUP BY r.requirement_name;
SELECT r.requirement_name, SUM(c.record_id) AS total_records FROM regulatory_requirements r INNER JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id GROUP BY r.requirement_name;
SELECT r.requirement_name, c.date FROM regulatory_requirements r INNER JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id WHERE c.date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT r.requirement_name, c.date FROM regulatory_requirements r INNER JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id WHERE c.date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT r.requirement_name, c.date FROM regulatory_requirements r INNER JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id ORDER BY c.date DESC;
SELECT r.requirement_name, c.date FROM regulatory_requirements r INNER JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id ORDER BY c.date ASC;
SELECT r.requirement_name, c.date FROM regulatory_requirements r INNER JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id LIMIT 10;
SELECT r.requirement_name, c.date FROM regulatory_requirements r INNER JOIN compliance_records c ON r.requirement_id = c.requirement_id LIMIT 5 OFFSET 5;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement_id, requirement_name FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_name LIKE '%compliance%';

SELECT compliance_records.record_id, compliance_records.date, regulatory_requirements.requirement_name FROM compliance_records JOIN regulatory_requirements ON compliance_records.requirement_id = regulatory_requirements.requirement_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_requirements FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT AVG(date) AS avg_date FROM compliance_records;
SELECT requirement_id, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM compliance_records GROUP BY requirement_id;

SELECT requirement_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM regulatory_requirements LEFT JOIN compliance_records ON regulatory_requirements.requirement_id = compliance_records.requirement_id GROUP BY requirement_name;

SELECT requirement_name, MAX(date) AS latest_record_date FROM regulatory_requirements LEFT JOIN compliance_records ON regulatory_requirements.requirement_id = compliance_records.requirement_id GROUP BY requirement_name;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_id IN (SELECT requirement_id FROM compliance_records);
SELECT requirement_id, date FROM compliance_records WHERE DATE(date) = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE description IS NULL;

SELECT requirement_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM regulatory_requirements LEFT JOIN compliance_records ON regulatory_requirements.requirement_id = compliance_records.requirement_id WHERE compliance_records.date < '2022-01-01' GROUP BY requirement_name;
SELECT requirement_id, MAX(date) AS latest_record_date FROM compliance_records WHERE description LIKE '%important%' GROUP BY requirement_id;

SELECT requirement_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM regulatory_requirements LEFT JOIN compliance_records ON regulatory_requirements.requirement_id = compliance_records.requirement_id WHERE compliance_records.description IS NOT NULL GROUP BY requirement_name;
SELECT description, COUNT(*) AS records_count FROM compliance_records GROUP BY description HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT requirement_id, AVG(DATEDIFF(CURRENT_DATE, date)) AS avg_days_since_record FROM compliance_records GROUP BY requirement_id;
SELECT requirement_id, MIN(date) AS earliest_record_date FROM compliance_records WHERE description LIKE '%urgent%' GROUP BY requirement_id;
SELECT requirement_name, description FROM regulatory_requirements UNION SELECT NULL, description FROM compliance_records;

SELECT requirement_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM regulatory_requirements LEFT JOIN compliance_records ON regulatory_requirements.requirement_id = compliance_records.requirement_id GROUP BY requirement_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT requirement_id, date FROM compliance_records WHERE requirement_id IN (SELECT requirement_id FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE description LIKE '%important%');
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT standard_name, description FROM compliance_standards;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records;
SELECT requirement_id, date_recorded FROM compliance_records WHERE standard_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE id = 1;
SELECT standard_name FROM compliance_standards WHERE standard_id = 2;
SELECT requirement, status FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE requirement_id = 3;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT standard_id, standard_name FROM compliance_standards WHERE description IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT status FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE id = 2;
SELECT standard_id, description FROM compliance_standards WHERE standard_name = 'ISO 9001';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE status <> 'Completed';
SELECT MAX(date_recorded) FROM compliance_records;
SELECT requirement_id, standard_id FROM compliance_records WHERE record_id = 10;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT requirement_id) FROM compliance_records;
SELECT * FROM compliance_standards WHERE standard_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT AVG(record_id) FROM compliance_records;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement, status FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT standard_name, description FROM compliance_standards WHERE standard_id=1;
SELECT * FROM compliance_records WHERE date_recorded >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT r.requirement, s.standard_name FROM regulatory_requirements r JOIN compliance_records cr ON r.id = cr.requirement_id JOIN compliance_standards s ON cr.standard_id = s.standard_id;

SELECT r.id, r.requirement, cr.record_id, s.standard_name FROM regulatory_requirements r JOIN compliance_records cr ON r.id = cr.requirement_id JOIN compliance_standards s ON cr.standard_id = s.standard_id;

SELECT r.requirement, cr.requirement_id, s.standard_name, cr.standard_id FROM regulatory_requirements r JOIN compliance_records cr ON r.id = cr.requirement_id JOIN compliance_standards s ON cr.standard_id = s.standard_id;
SELECT COUNT(*), AVG(record_id) FROM compliance_records;
SELECT s.standard_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM compliance_standards s JOIN compliance_records cr ON s.standard_id = cr.standard_id GROUP BY s.standard_name;
SELECT r.requirement, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM regulatory_requirements r JOIN compliance_records cr ON r.id = cr.requirement_id GROUP BY r.requirement HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;

SELECT r.requirement, s.standard_name, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM regulatory_requirements r JOIN compliance_records cr ON r.id = cr.requirement_id JOIN compliance_standards s ON cr.standard_id = s.standard_id GROUP BY r.requirement, s.standard_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;

SELECT r.requirement, s.standard_name, cr.date_recorded, cr.record_id FROM regulatory_requirements r JOIN compliance_records cr ON r.id = cr.requirement_id JOIN compliance_standards s ON cr.standard_id = s.standard_id ORDER BY cr.date_recorded DESC;

SELECT r.requirement, s.standard_name, cr.date_recorded, cr.record_id FROM regulatory_requirements r JOIN compliance_records cr ON r.id = cr.requirement_id JOIN compliance_standards s ON cr.standard_id = s.standard_id ORDER BY s.standard_name, cr.date_recorded;
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(cr.date_recorded, '%Y-%m') AS month_year, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM compliance_records cr GROUP BY month_year;

SELECT r.requirement, s.standard_name, SUM(cr.record_id) AS total_record_id FROM regulatory_requirements r JOIN compliance_records cr ON r.id = cr.requirement_id JOIN compliance_standards s ON cr.standard_id = s.standard_id GROUP BY r.requirement, s.standard_name;

SELECT r.requirement, s.standard_name, YEAR(cr.date_recorded) AS year_recorded FROM regulatory_requirements r JOIN compliance_records cr ON r.id = cr.requirement_id JOIN compliance_standards s ON cr.standard_id = s.standard_id;

SELECT r.requirement, s.standard_name, DAYOFWEEK(cr.date_recorded) AS week_day_recorded FROM regulatory_requirements r JOIN compliance_records cr ON r.id = cr.requirement_id JOIN compliance_standards s ON cr.standard_id = s.standard_id;

SELECT CONCAT(r.id, '-', s.standard_id) AS composite_key, r.requirement, s.standard_name FROM regulatory_requirements r JOIN compliance_records cr ON r.id = cr.requirement_id JOIN compliance_standards s ON cr.standard_id = s.standard_id;

SELECT r.requirement AS regulatory_requirement, s.standard_name AS compliance_standard FROM regulatory_requirements r JOIN compliance_records cr ON r.id = cr.requirement_id JOIN compliance_standards s ON cr.standard_id = s.standard_id;

SELECT r.id, r.requirement, s.standard_id, s.standard_name FROM regulatory_requirements r JOIN compliance_records cr ON r.id = cr.requirement_id JOIN compliance_standards s ON cr.standard_id = s.standard_id ORDER BY r.id ASC, s.standard_id DESC;

SELECT r.requirement, s.standard_name, DATEDIFF(NOW(), cr.date_recorded) AS days_since_recorded FROM regulatory_requirements r JOIN compliance_records cr ON r.id = cr.requirement_id JOIN compliance_standards s ON cr.standard_id = s.standard_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement_name, description FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT * FROM compliance_officers;
SELECT officer_name, email FROM compliance_officers;
SELECT * FROM compliance_logs;
SELECT action, timestamp FROM compliance_logs;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT id, requirement_name, description FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT id, officer_name, email FROM compliance_officers;
SELECT log_id, action, timestamp FROM compliance_logs;
SELECT doc_id, document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT id, requirement_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT id, officer_name, phone_number FROM compliance_officers;
SELECT log_id, action, officer_id FROM compliance_logs;
SELECT doc_id, document_name, document_url FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT r.id, r.requirement_name, l.action, d.document_name FROM regulatory_requirements r, compliance_logs l, compliance_documents d;
SELECT o.officer_name, l.action, d.document_name FROM compliance_officers o, compliance_logs l, compliance_documents d;
SELECT r.requirement_name, l.action, d.document_name FROM regulatory_requirements r, compliance_logs l, compliance_documents d;
SELECT r.id, r.requirement_name, c.officer_name, l.action FROM regulatory_requirements r, compliance_officers c, compliance_logs l;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT requirement_name, description FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM compliance_officers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT officer_name, phone_number FROM compliance_officers WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT action, timestamp FROM compliance_logs WHERE officer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT document_name, document_url FROM compliance_documents WHERE doc_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT regulatory_requirements.requirement_name, compliance_officers.officer_name FROM regulatory_requirements JOIN compliance_officers ON regulatory_requirements.id = compliance_officers.id;
SELECT compliance_logs.action, compliance_officers.officer_name FROM compliance_logs JOIN compliance_officers ON compliance_logs.officer_id = compliance_officers.id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_name LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM compliance_officers WHERE phone_number IN ('123', '456', '789');
SELECT officer_name, email FROM compliance_officers ORDER BY officer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Report' AND document_url NOT NULL;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM compliance_officers;
SELECT AVG(timestamp) FROM compliance_logs;
SELECT DISTINCT document_type FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT * FROM compliance_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT officer_name, phone_number FROM compliance_officers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com' LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM compliance_logs;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM compliance_officers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement_name, description FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT id, compliance_status FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT * FROM compliance_logs;
SELECT log_date, log_entry FROM compliance_logs;
SELECT * FROM compliance_personnel;
SELECT personnel_name, department FROM compliance_personnel;
SELECT * FROM compliance_audit;
SELECT auditor_name, audit_date FROM compliance_audit;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = true;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE requirement_name LIKE '%security%';
SELECT * FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT * FROM compliance_logs WHERE log_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM compliance_personnel WHERE department = 'Legal';
SELECT * FROM compliance_audit WHERE audit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT MAX(log_date) FROM compliance_logs;
SELECT personnel_role, COUNT(*) FROM compliance_personnel GROUP BY personnel_role HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT requirement_name, description FROM regulatory_requirements;
SELECT document_name, document_type FROM compliance_documents;
SELECT personnel_name, personnel_role, department FROM compliance_personnel;
SELECT audit_id, auditor_name, audit_date FROM compliance_audit;
SELECT requirement_name, compliance_status FROM regulatory_requirements WHERE compliance_status = TRUE;
SELECT document_name, document_link FROM compliance_documents WHERE document_type = 'Policy';
SELECT personnel_name, email FROM compliance_personnel WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT log_date, log_entry FROM compliance_logs WHERE requirement_id = 1;
SELECT requirement_name, description FROM regulatory_requirements ORDER BY requirement_name DESC;
SELECT document_name, document_link FROM compliance_documents ORDER BY document_name ASC;
SELECT personnel_name, personnel_role FROM compliance_personnel ORDER BY personnel_name ASC;
SELECT audit_date, findings FROM compliance_audit ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements INNER JOIN compliance_documents ON regulatory_requirements.id = compliance_documents.requirement_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements INNER JOIN compliance_logs ON regulatory_requirements.id = compliance_logs.requirement_id;
SELECT * FROM compliance_personnel LEFT JOIN compliance_audit ON compliance_personnel.personnel_id = compliance_audit.audit_id;
SELECT * FROM compliance_audit RIGHT JOIN compliance_documents ON compliance_audit.audit_id = compliance_documents.document_id;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_requirements LEFT JOIN compliance_logs ON regulatory_requirements.id = compliance_logs.requirement_id WHERE compliance_logs.log_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM compliance_audit RIGHT JOIN compliance_personnel ON compliance_audit.auditor_name = compliance_personnel.personnel_name;
